summary: This bill, S. 601, introduced in the Senate by Mr. Paul and Mr. McConnell, aims to remove deed restrictions from a 3.62-acre parcel of land in Paducah, Kentucky. The land is located at 2956 Park Avenue, within the Paducah Memorial Army Reserve Center, and was previously conveyed by the Secretary of the Interior to the City of Paducah in 2012. The bill directs the Secretary of the Interior to execute the necessary instruments to eliminate the existing restrictions, as detailed in the original quitclaim deed.
